provider.name: FreeSat UK

dvbsconfigs.configuration: BBC NE & C/ITV Tyne Tees N
BBC NE & C/ITV Tyne Tees S

provider.servicehacks:
try: is_assigned except: is_assigned = True
dxHoldName = 0x8 # details of lamedb flags are in README.txt
itv_rename = { # ITV regions 33771: "ITV Border", 33772: "ITV Border Scotland", 33776: "ITV Central", 33777: "ITV Channel Isles", 33778: "ITV Granada", 33779: "ITV London", 33780: "ITV Meridian East", 33782: "ITV Meridian South", 33784: "ITV Tyne Tees", 33786: "ITV West Country", 33788: "ITV West", 33790: "ITV Yorkshire West", 33791: "STV Grampian", 33792: "STV Scotland West", 33793: "STV Scotland East", 33794: "UTV", 33795: "ITV +1 Meridian", 33796: "ITV +1 Granada", 33797: "ITV +1 Central", 33798: "ITV +1 London", 33800: "ITV +1 West Country", 33801: "ITV +1 Tyne Tees", 33802: "ITV +1 Yorkshire", 33803: "ITV +1 Anglia", 33804: "ITV +1 Wales", 33805: "ITV +1 West", 33806: "ITV Central East", 33808: "UTV HD", 33878: "ITV Yorkshire East", 33879: "ITV Anglia West", 33880: "ITV Meridian North", 33882: "ITV Anglia HD", 33883: "ITV Tyne Tees HD", 33884: "ITV Yorkshire HD", 42773: "ITV London HD", 42775: "ITV Granada HD", 42779: "ITV Meridian South HD", 42780: "ITV Central West HD", 42781: "ITV Wales HD", 42784: "ITV Border England HD", 42785: "ITV Westcountry SW HD", 42786: "ITV Westcountry West HD", 52777: "STV HD", }
rename = { # channel_id: service_name, 36794: 'Arirang TV HD', 49782: 'Pick HD', }
rename_by_sid = { 5828: "Pick", }
# Rename channels if "channel_id" in service and service["channel_id"] in rename: service["interactive_name"] = rename[service["channel_id"]] # left for backwards compatibility service["service_name"] = rename[service["channel_id"]] service["service_flags"] = dxHoldName
# Rename ITV channels if "channel_id" in service and service["channel_id"] in itv_rename: service["interactive_name"] = itv_rename[service["channel_id"]] # left for backwards compatibility service["service_name"] = itv_rename[service["channel_id"]] service["service_flags"] = dxHoldName
# Rename channels by sid if "service_id" in service and service["service_id"] in rename_by_sid: service["service_name"] = rename_by_sid[service["service_id"]] service["service_flags"] = dxHoldName
# Correct service type of HD channels not marked as 25 if "service_info" in service and "HD" in service["service_info"] and service["service_type"] in DvbScanner.VIDEO_ALLOWED_TYPES and service["service_type"] not in DvbScanner.HD_ALLOWED_TYPES: service["service_type"] = 25
if (service["namespace"] >> 16) != 282: skip = True elif service["number"] in range(984, 987): # BBC RB 4/5/6 service["interactive_name"] = "BBC RB " + str(service["number"] - 980) elif service["number"] == 999: # Freesat info service["interactive_name"] = "Freesat Info" elif service["number"] > 999 or service["number"] < 101: skip = True
#radio channels if service["number"] >= 700 and service["number"] < 800: service["service_type"] = 2
